casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rama Dion Benjamin CRUMP 151PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2019 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Crump, Ramar Dion Benjamin

James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill

Peter A. Regulski, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 4th of January 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of January 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 6th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
